welcomeToInsidersModal.title:
**Functional Purpose**: Main title of the welcome modal
**UI Location**: Welcome To Insiders Modal (header)
**When Users See This**: When the modal opens for Insiders
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Welcome to Insiders! üíô"
welcomeToInsidersModal.accessToFeatures:
**Functional Purpose**: Description of features unlocked by Insiders
**UI Location**: Welcome To Insiders Modal (header paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When the modal opens for Insiders
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "You now have access to Dark Mode, ChatGPT Integration, extra mentoring slots along with behind the scenes videos, new badges, and more!"
welcomeToInsidersModal.thanksForBeingPar:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading expressing gratitude
**UI Location**: Welcome To Insiders Modal (main content section)
**When Users See This**: When the modal opens for Insiders
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Thanks for being part of our story!"
welcomeToInsidersModal.exercismReliesOnP:
**Functional Purpose**: Explains the importance of community support for Exercism
**UI Location**: Welcome To Insiders Modal (main content paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When the modal opens for Insiders
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Exercism relies on people like you giving up your time and money to help others. Without you we wouldn't have helped the multitude of people that we have. Our journey is still just beginning and we're really glad to have you along with us. Thank you so much for making Exercism possible üíô"
welcomeToInsidersModal.weHopeInsidersIsF:
**Functional Purpose**: Encourages users to explore Insiders features and watch the welcome video
**UI Location**: Welcome To Insiders Modal (main content paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When the modal opens for Insiders
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "We hope Insiders is a fun experience. We recommend watching the video on the right to get an overview of how your account has now changed, and also checking out the Insiders page behind this modal to see all the features you've unlocked."
welcomeToInsidersModal.greatLetsGo:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to dismiss the welcome modal and proceed
**UI Location**: Welcome To Insiders Modal (action button)
**When Users See This**: When the modal is open
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Great. Let's go!"
welcomeToInsidersModal.startWithOurWelco:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the welcome video section
**UI Location**: Welcome To Insiders Modal (right-hand panel heading)
**When Users See This**: When the modal opens for Insiders
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Start with our welcome video üëáüèΩ"
welcomeToInsidersModal.whatShouldIDoNext:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the 'What to do next' section
**UI Location**: Welcome To Insiders Modal (right-hand panel heading below video)
**When Users See This**: When the modal opens for Insiders
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "What should I do next?"
welcomeToInsidersModal.exploreDarkMode:
**Functional Purpose**: Suggestions for actions a new Insider can take
**UI Location**: Welcome To Insiders Modal (right-hand panel paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When the modal opens for Insiders
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Explore Dark Mode (we've enabled it by default). Check out your new badge(s). Try ChatGPT in the online editor. Use one of your new mentoring slots. Come and say hello on the #insiders channel on Discord. Or watch some of the behind the scenes videos üéâ"
